info: Your booking is confirmed for the following times
resultWithReservations: Your booking is confirmed for the following times.
resultWithoutReservations: Unfortunately, your booking requests could not be confirmed.
errorGeneratingPDF: Failed to create the PDF document
saveNewTimeSuccess: Time of the booking has been changed
cancelReservationBody: You are about to cancel your booking.
cancelInfoBody: We want to make the Varaamo service even better. We would love to hear why you are cancelling your booking.
cancelDescriptionPlaceHolder: Please explain briefly why you are cancelling the booking.
reservationCancelledBody: You will receive a booking confirmation by email in a moment.
makeNewReservation: Please make a new booking for the same item.

modifyTimeReasons.RESERVATION_MODIFICATION_NOT_ALLOWED: Unfortunately, the booking could not be changed.
modifyTimeReasons.RESERVATION_MODIFICATION_NOT_ALLOWED_SUF: If necessary, you can cancel it and make a new booking.
modifyTimeReasons.RESERVATION_BEGIN_IN_PAST: The booking can no longer be cancelled or changed because the booking time has passed.
modifyTimeReasons.CANCELLATION_NOT_ALLOWED: The booking is binding and cannot be cancelled.
modifyTimeReasons.CANCELLATION_TIME_PAST: Unfortunately, the booking could not be cancelled or changed, because the cancellation time has passed.
modifyTimeReasons.RESERVATION_TIME_INVALID: The booking period is too short

cancellationReasons.termsAreBinding: The booking is binding and cannot be cancelled.
cancellationReasons.buffer: Unfortunately, the booking could not be cancelled or changed, because the cancellation time has passed.

backToReservationUnit: Go back to the item’s front page
reservationExpiredDescription: Your booking expired before the payment was processed. Please, repeat the booking process.

confirmationError.heading: Awaiting for payment
confirmationError.body: Your payment could not be confirmed. Please check the status of your booking in a moment from Your bookings -page. If the booking was unsuccessful, please repeat the booking process. Our customer service will provide assistance if necessary.
